description: No parking is allowed on many major city streets from 3 a.m. to 7 a.m. between December 1st and April 1st.  To view or use these shapefiles, compression software and special GIS software, such as ESRI ArcGIS, is required. To download this file, right-click the "Download" link above and choose "Save link as."

name: Winter Overnight Parking Restrictions
